  • Constructor Details

    • ChunkContainer

      public ChunkContainer(SpigotStorageAPI api, org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
      Creates a container that stores data using a Chunk. This will use the default settings in StorageSettings.
      Parameters:
      api - The IStorageAPI instance.
      chunk - The Chunk to store/retrieve data from.

    • ChunkContainer

      public ChunkContainer(SpigotStorageAPI api, org.bukkit.Chunk chunk, StorageSettings settings)
      Creates a container that stores data using a Chunk. This will use the provided settings from StorageSettings.
      Parameters:
      api - The IStorageAPI instance.
      chunk - The Chunk to store/retrieve data from.
      settings - The StorageSettings for this Container.

      The PersistentDataHolder that this Container supports.
      Specified by:
      getHolder in class PDContainer
      Returns:
      The PersistentDataHolder that will be used to read/write data to.
